title: 104_hr2413
content: Tongass Transfer and Transition Act - Provides for the transfer to Alaska of the Tongass National Forest if so elected by Alaska within a specified period of time. Sets forth transition provisions, including: (1) reinstatement of the Alaska Pulp Corporation, (2) creation of a timber road revolving fund, (3) land grants to Native Alaskans, and (4) timber and mining provisions.
